author: Ed Crocker
description:
Let’s talk about movies for a second. I’m a slasher hound, and so it’s no surprise to learn that one of my favourite horror films is Scream, the game-changing slasher whodunnit, much copied, never bested. Slasher fans know that it’s not so much legendary director Wes Craven but the scriptwriter Kevin Williamson who we have […]

The post REVIEW: Breathe In, Bleed Out by Brian McAuley appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Breathe In, Bleed Out by Brian McAuley
